headline: Sonder Secures New Funding, Amends Marriott Agreement
summary: Sonder Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:SOND) shares surged on Friday following the company's announcement of a new financing plan aimed at reinforcing its liquidity and supporting future growth. On August 5, 2025, the company raised $24.54 million through the issuance of units consisting of senior secured promissory notes and warrants to buy common stock at an exercise price of $1.50 per share. The notes carry a 15% annual interest rate and mature in July 2026. To finalize aspects of the transaction, Sond

headline: Prediction: This Dividend Stock Will Beat the Market Over the Next 5 Years
summary: While its stock is out of favor on Wall Street this year, the company is repurchasing a huge amount of stock. Should you be buying shares, too?
